name: Mango Farmers Club
description: What is the project about? - The Mango Farmers Club (MFC) is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) dedicated to promoting the adoption of Central Limit Order Book (CLOB) infrastructure on the Polygon zkEVM ecosystem. What makes your project unique? - MFC is the first community-owned meme token project for the Polygon zkEVM ecosystem. Whatâ€™s next for your project? - MFC will encourage the adoption of CLOB infrastructure in Polygon zkEVM What can your token be used for? - Governance token for the Mango Farmers Club DAO
